summary: A homage to the work of psychologist Wilhelm Reich, matched with a story about a Yugoslavian girl's affair with a Russian skater. Sexual repression, social systems and the orgone theory are explored.
cast: Milena Dravic|Ivica Vidovic|Jagoda Kaloper|Tuli Kupferberg|Zoran Radmilovic|Jackie Curtis|Miodrag Andric|Zivka Matic|Dragoljub Ivkov|Nikola Milic|Milan Jelic|Jim Buckley|Betty Dodson|Mikheil Gelovani|Nancy Godfrey|Zedong Mao|Wilhelm Reich
title: Los misterios del organismo
